::DevilDuer/Zardus::

DevilDuer swears as his wrist beeps, reporting enemy units heading for the 
alliance base.

"Zardus," he says into his comm-link, "Four enemy signatures are moving 
toward the base from the new ship."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"Slag," Zardus says as he recieves DevilDuer's transmission. "Hell Beast," he 
says into his comm-link, "It seems that these new bots are attacking my base 
as well. I will leave Reptilica here."

With that, he signals to Bloodystrike to get back to base, ordering Reptilica 
to stay untill further orders.

Zardus and Bloodystrike fly off back toward the alliance base.
